entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 30 March 2023
